items.title: New Vocation: Monk
items.description: The Monk has arrived to join forces and bring a new style of play with unique abilities and combat techniques.

items.title: Epic Boss Battle
items.description: Face the legendary Dragon Lord in the newly opened Demon Forge dungeon. Rare rewards await!

items.title: Double XP Weekend
items.description: Join us this weekend for double experience points! Level up faster and reach new heights.

items.title: Test Server - Monk Beta
items.description: Teste a nova vocação Monk antes do lançamento oficial! Experiência única no servidor de testes.

items.title: Beta Testing Events
items.description: Participe de eventos exclusivos do servidor de teste e ajude-nos a balancear o jogo.

items.title: New Dungeon Preview
items.description: Explore a nova dungeon 'Crystal Caves' antes do lançamento no servidor principal!

items.title: Experimental Features
items.description: Teste funcionalidades experimentais e nos dê feedback para melhorar o jogo.
